DOC.brief_summary: Two year study to determine the safety and efficacy of weekly 35 mg Risedronate doses in men with osteoporosis followed by a two year follow-up study.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Risedronate Therapy Administered 35 mg Once A Week in Men With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Documented osteoporosis of the femoral neck and lumbar spine BMI greater than or equal to 35
